participant_1.name: Karen
participant_1.personality: caring and practical, always looking after her family.
participant_1.background: i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: imaginative and sensitive, struggles with anxiety but enjoys the escapism of gaming.
participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.
